The meeting in Uppsala will be an on-site meeting with sessions of two short courses on scientific computing and statistical methods in animal breeding. 

**Dates:** 16th to 18th of February, 2026.

**Venue:** The Ultuna Campus at SLU, Uppsala.

**Travel expenses and accommodation:** may be covered if you are a PhD student or researcher at one of the partner institutions. Please contact your contact person for more information.

**Meeting Schedule**

Lunches are scheduled between 12:00 and 13:00 every day. 


| Date                     | Format  | Duration        | Activity                                                                            |
|--------------------------|---------|-----------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 16–17 February           | Onsite  | Lunch-to-lunch  | Course: [Statistical methods in animal breeding](../20251120_course_NADAS_stats/)                           |
| 17–18 February           | Onsite  | Lunch-to-lunch  | Course: [Scientific computing using Julia language](../20260210_course_julia/)                         |
| 18 February (afternoon)  | Onsite  | After lunch     | Final NADAS meeting for network members


:  {.striped .hover}

<br>
For more information, including travel and hotel information, please download the [meeting PDF](Welcome%20to%20the%20NADAS%20meeting%20in%20Uppsala%20with%20more%20info.pdf).

We look forward meeting you in Uppsala!
